column4: hey, ummm... what's the bash method of starting a program, but returning to the command line - say you want to run gedit or something?
check bash job contoll docs for more details :) and fancy things like ctrl-z and bg/fg commands
yeah - it is all coming back to me - has been years and years.  Just got beaten tho.  "sudo gedit menu.lst&" produces interesting results
proper spaceing is needed in linux.. Unlike DOS. :)
